author: lisakaniyur
title: Fantastic New Year's Eve Stay in Times Square!
text:
Novotel is in a fantastic location right in the heart of Times Square! We stayed for New Years Eve 2016/2017 and we were not disappointed. Got a room on 15th floor and it had a great view could see the crowds and ball drop and get the atmosphere of New Years eve without the cold. Walked to Rockefeller Christmas Tree and Broadway Theatre show. Great place for exploring New York.
Room Tip: Get a room overlooking Times Square fantastic view for NYE! See more room tips
